```{r}
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery") %>% 
  #addMarkers(lat = 11.21, 
             #lng = -85.73) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(lng = -85.73,
                    lat = 11.21, 
                    popup = "centro del circulo",
                   fillColor= "alpha", opacity = 1,
             options = markerOptions(draggable = FALSE, title = "NIPI")) %>% 
  setView(lat = 11.21,
          lng = -85.73,
          zoom = 10)

map
```
